message.content:
cs.AI, cs.HC, cs.IR, cs.CL, cs.CY. 

The paper discusses a system that combines personalized recommendation systems and dialogue systems to create personalized aides for item selection. This involves the use of a novel user model that influences both item search and the questions asked during a conversation. Therefore, the most likely sub-categories are cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) and cs.HC (Human-Computer Interaction). The paper also involves information retrieval (IR) and natural language processing (NLP) techniques, which suggest the sub-categories cs.IR and cs.CL (Computation and Language). Finally, the paper deals with user modeling and personalization, which could fall under the sub-category cs.CY (Computers and Society).
